content: this coordinating set with a napkin/cutlery roll and mason jar cozy makes a perfect set for summer cookouts barbecues and picnics use the same color combination and striping sequence for each set or make each set different so each guest has a unique pair originally published in 3 parts as the twelfth weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet crocheting flat in row crocheting in the back loop only includes link to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces changing colors crocheting over yarn tails includes video tutorials **skill level** easy **finished sizes** napkin/cutlery roll 13 25 33 5 cm square mason jar cozy 2 5 6 5 cm wide x 9 25 23 5 cm long **materials for 1 set/1 person** lion brand 24/7 cotton yarn 100% mercerized cotton 3 5 oz/100 g/186 yd/170 m 1 skein each in 113b red ca 100 white cb and 110 navy cc or approximately 100 yd 91 5 m in each of 3 medium weight mercerized cotton yarns us size 7/4 5 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* stitch marker optional yarn needle 2 star-shaped sew-through buttons i used 2 from this favorite findings 3 5oz stars buttons value pack 3 **gauge** 18 sts = 4 10 cm across in pattern for grit stitch row 2 in pattern *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/06/07/weekend-mystery-cal-12/ 3 https //prf hn/l/oqyjdm0
